# Deprecated Symbols

**API Collection**

MapKit classes, protocols, and entitlements that are no longer supported.

## Classes

- **MKCircleView**: Provides the visual representation for an [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKCircle] annotation object.
- **MKOverlayView**: Defines the basic behavior associated with all overlay views.
- **MKOverlayPathView**: Represents a generic overlay that draws its contents using a Core Graphics path data type.
- **MKPolygonView**: Provides the visual representation for an [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKPolygon] annotation object.
- **MKPolylineView**: Provides the visual representation for an [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKPolyline] annotation object.
- **MKPinAnnotationView**: An annotation view that displays a pin image on the map.

## Properties

- **filterType**: The filter options for the search results.
- **pinColor**: The color of the pin head.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.
- **mapType**: The map’s visual style.

## Methods

- **view(for:)**: Returns the view associated with the overlay object, if any.
- **mapView(_:didAddOverlayViews:)**: Tells the delegate when the map adds one or more overlay views to the map.
- **mapView(_:viewFor:)**: Asks the delegate for the overlay view to use when displaying the specified overlay object.

## Protocols

- **MapPin**: A pin-shaped annotation used to indicate a location on a map.

## Enumerations

- **MKLocalSearchCompleter.FilterType**: Constants indicating the types of search completions to return.
- **MKMapType**: The type of map to display.
- **MKPinAnnotationColor**: The supported colors for pin annotations.

## Entitlements

- **Maps Entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may provide directions beyond what Maps supports, such as subway routes, hiking trails, and bike paths.
